seo.title: Trust Gaps Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores (2026)

how to improve trust gaps shopify

key_findings: The median Supplements store has a trust gap of 1, indicating moderate trust signal implementation
Best-in-class stores (P10) achieve trust gap scores of just 0, showing strong trust signal optimization
The 3 point spread between top and bottom performers shows trust optimization is a key differentiator
Supplements shoppers have specific trust expectations that most stores partially address
Source: Boostra analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Add authentic customer reviews and ratings prominently on product pages
Display trust badges, security seals, and payment icons clearly
Include detailed shipping and return policy information
Show real-time inventory and social proof (e.g., 'X people viewing')
Add founder story or 'About Us' content to build brand authenticity
Implement live chat or clear contact options for customer questions
Display any press mentions, certifications, or industry awards

jsonld.name: Trust Gaps Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 35 Shopify stores in the health supplements industry, measuring trust gaps.

acceptedAnswer.text: Trust Gap Score measures the difference between what shoppers expect and what your store delivers in terms of trust signals. Lower scores indicate better alignment with customer expectations.

mainEntity.name: Why does Trust Gaps matter for supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Supplements are ingested, making trust paramount. Shoppers need third-party testing results, FDA facility registrations, sourcing transparency, and reviews about effectiveness.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Trust Gaps for Shopify supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, the median trust gaps is 1. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 0. A score of 0 means perfect trust alignment, while higher scores indicate gaps that may hurt conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my supplements store's Trust Gaps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Add authentic customer reviews and ratings prominently on product pages. Display trust badges, security seals, and payment icons clearly. Include detailed shipping and return policy information. Show real-time inventory and social proof (e.g., 'X people viewing'). For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your trust gaps against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 1 (the median), you're in the top half of supplements stores. If you're better than 0, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
